info.description: API for managing quizzes, quiz suites, and users
info.title: Quizlet API

get.description: Retrieve all quiz suites for the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new quiz suite with the provided details

get.description: Retrieve a specific quiz suite by its ID
get.summary: Get a quiz suite by ID

put.description: Update an existing quiz suite with the provided details

delete.description: Delete a quiz suite by its ID

get.description: Get all quiz attempts for a specific quiz suite that belong to the authenticated user
get.summary: List quiz attempts for a quiz suite

post.description: Create a new quiz attempt for a specific quiz suite

get.description: Get a specific quiz attempt by ID

put.description: Update a specific quiz attempt by ID

delete.description: Delete a specific quiz attempt by ID

post.description: Add an existing quiz to a quiz suite
post.summary: Add a quiz to a quiz suite

delete.description: Remove a quiz from an existing quiz suite
delete.summary: Remove a quiz from a quiz suite

post.description: Create a new quiz with the provided information

get.description: Get all quizzes created by the authenticated user
Get quiz information by quiz ID

put.description: Update quiz information by quiz ID

delete.description: Delete a quiz by quiz ID

post.description: Add a new selection to a quiz
post.summary: Add a selection to a quiz

delete.description: Remove a selection from an existing quiz
delete.summary: Remove a selection from a quiz

post.description: Create a new user with the provided information
Authenticate user with email and password

get.description: Get the current authenticated user's information

post.description: Get a new access token using a refresh token

get.description: Get user information by user ID

put.description: Update user information by user ID

delete.description: Delete a user by user ID

error.description:
The error message
@example "quiz attempt not found"

quiz_attempt.CreateQuizAttemptRequest.description: Request body for creating a new quiz attempt

quiz_attempt.QuizAttempt.description: A record of a user's attempt at completing a quiz suite

completed.description:
Whether the attempt is completed
@example true

deleted_at.description:
The timestamp when the quiz attempt was deleted (soft delete)
@readOnly true

user.description:
The user who made the attempt
@readOnly true

quiz_attempt.UpdateQuizAttemptRequest.description: Request body for updating an existing quiz attempt

completed.description:
Whether the attempt is completed
@example true

description.description:
@example "A collection of quizzes about various topics"
@required true
description.example: A collection of quizzes about various topics

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
